IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. *) timer(IN:= TRUE, PT := T#200MS); IF NOT(timer.Q = FALSE AND timer.IN) THEN timer(IN:= FALSE); FUR.state := FUR_State.FUR_SUCCER_UP_AT_RD; SM.currW.state := W_State.AT_FUR_ON_ROTARY_DESK; END_IF

(* Copyright (c) 2019 Manuel Goester, Michael Witt, Klaus Kammerer Institute of Databases and Information Systems, Ulm University, Germany
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. *) IF NOT(FUR.sSuckerPosRa) THEN FUR.mSuckertoRa := TRUE; FUR.state := FUR_State.FUR_SUCCER_TO_ROTARY_DESK; ELSE FUR.mSuckertoRa := FALSE; FUR.compressor := FALSE; FUR.valveLowering := TRUE; FUR.state := FUR_State.FUR_SUCCER_AT_ROTARY_DESK; END_IF

(* Copyright (c) 2019 Manuel Goester, Michael Witt, Klaus Kammerer Institute of Databases and Information Systems, Ulm University, Germany
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. *) IF SM.currW.format.sawEnabled THEN SM.currW.state := W_State.AT_FUR_AT_SAW; IF NOT(FUR.sRaPosSaw) THEN FUR.mRaClockwise := TRUE; ELSE FUR.mRaClockwise := FALSE; sawStopped := TRUE; END_IF
IF sawStopped THEN timer(IN:= TRUE, PT := SM.currW.format.sawDuration); FUR.mSaw := TRUE;
IF NOT(timer.Q = FALSE AND timer.IN) THEN timer(IN:=FALSE); FUR.mSaw := FALSE; sawStopped := FALSE; FUR.state := FUR_State.FUR_SAW_FINISHED; END_IF END_IF ELSE // skip saw FUR.state := FUR_State.FUR_SKIP_SAW; END_IF

(* Copyright (c) 2019 Manuel Goester, Michael Witt, Klaus Kammerer Institute of Databases and Information Systems, Ulm University, Germany
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. *) trigger := 0;

(* Copyright (c) 2019 Manuel Goester, Michael Witt, Klaus Kammerer Institute of Databases and Information Systems, Ulm University, Germany
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. *) FUR.state := -1; sawStopped := FALSE; trigger := 0;

(* Copyright (c) 2019 Manuel Goester, Michael Witt, Klaus Kammerer Institute of Databases and Information Systems, Ulm University, Germany
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. *) IF FUR.sFurnanceSliderOutside THEN FUR.compressor := TRUE; FUR.valveLowering := TRUE; FUR.valveVacuum := FALSE; timer(IN:= TRUE, PT := T#1S); IF NOT(timer.Q = FALSE AND timer.IN) THEN timer(IN:= FALSE); FUR.valveLowering := FALSE; FUR.state := FUR_State.FUR_SUCCER_DOWN_AT_RD; END_IF END_IF

(* Copyright (c) 2019 Manuel Goester, Michael Witt, Klaus Kammerer Institute of Databases and Information Systems, Ulm University, Germany
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. *) timer(IN:= TRUE, PT := T#2S); //sauger zum ofen IF FUR.sFurnanceSliderOutside THEN FUR.compressor := TRUE; FUR.valveLowering := TRUE; END_IF
IF NOT(timer.Q = FALSE AND timer.IN) THEN // reset timer timer(IN:= FALSE); // go to next step FUR.state := FUR_State.FUR_SUCCER_DOWN_AT_FUR; END_IF

(* Copyright (c) 2019 Manuel Goester, Michael Witt, Klaus Kammerer Institute of Databases and Information Systems, Ulm University, Germany
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. *) FUR.valveLowering := FALSE; FUR.valveVacuum := TRUE; //hier, sonst wird kein vakuum erzeugt SM.currW.state := W_State.AT_FUR_ATTACHED_TO_SUCCER; FUR.state := FUR_State.FUR_SUCCER_UP_AT_FUR;

(* Copyright (c) 2019 Manuel Goester, Michael Witt, Klaus Kammerer Institute of Databases and Information Systems, Ulm University, Germany
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE. *) IF NOT(FUR.sFurnanceSliderOutside) THEN FUR.mFurnanceSliderOut := TRUE; ELSE FUR.mFurnanceSliderOut := FALSE; END_IF
IF NOT(FUR.sSuckerPosRa) THEN FUR.mSuckertoRa := TRUE; ELSE FUR.mSuckertoRa := FALSE; END_IF
IF NOT(FUR.sRaPosSucker) THEN FUR.mRaCClockwise := TRUE; ELSE FUR.mRaCClockwise := FALSE; END_IF
IF FUR.sSuckerPosRa AND FUR.sRaPosSucker AND FUR.sFurnanceSliderOutside THEN FUR.state := FUR_WAITING_FOR_W; END_IF

// Workpiece passed light barrier IF FUR.lbFurnance AND trigger >= 2 THEN FUR.state := FUR_State.FUR_LB_PASSED; END_IF

So this batch job loaded its workpiece itself // now it is loaded, so production can start // signalise that production starts TC.state := TC_State.WAIT_UNTIL_W_FINISHED; fin := TRUE; ELSE // load a new workpiece TC.state := TC_State.LOAD_NEXT_W; END_IF END_IF

IF (TC_POU.started OR VG.any_motor_running) AND NOT(TC.instant_shutdown) THEN IF TC.mode_active = ExecutionMode.single THEN VG_SINGLE_MODE(); ELSIF TC.mode_active = ExecutionMode.multi THEN VG_MULTI_MODE(); END_IF ELSE // instant shutdown --> all motors off VG.mHorizontalBackward := FALSE; VG.mHorizontalForward := FALSE; VG.mRotationCClockwise := FALSE; VG.mRotationClockwise := FALSE; VG.mVerticalDown := FALSE; VG.mVerticalUp := FALSE; END_IF
